divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching the lunar eclipse in the n.e sky.i went around a shed and noticedwhat seemed to be a large metallic box kite.as i watched it started comingcloser and took on a large saucer like shape as it was descending.then irealized it was very large and i could see what seemed to be a spinning vortexof spiral gearlike lights on the underneath.it was not lit up but clearlyvisible in the moonlight.i was frozen with fear,tingling,disbelief,astonishment,but most of all dreadhopelessness.it was moving very slowly, now barely abovethe tree line, and appeared to be hovering over a house,i went to get a witnessbut unable to in my exitement so i krept back over to the place i was and seenit take off like a bullet to the east ascending.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Huron
There were no other sightings in Huron on or around November 8th 2003
